Posts.Content: Im starting my chemo today ( terrified) when i met my oncologist last week she discus sed which chemo i was having but then when i met the chemo nurse at the unit on friday she changed my chemo saying id been told the wrong ones! Im now feeling uneasy as i got my head round 1 & then it changed. Now ive got my head round this 1 im worried that when i see the oncologist today to chat & sign the consent forms. That its going to change again.
Posts.Title: 1st Chemo today

Posts.Content: Hello,  Thankyou for replying, im havibg EC every 3 weeks for 3 cycles & up  to now TAXOL every week for 9 weeks. This could change because im waiting on results of my genetics test which i had on monday. My oncologist mentioned that i might be eligable for a clinical trial depending on the results. Im having chemo before surgery x
Posts.Title: 1st Chemo today
